h2_title: Where to Find the Gore-Eye Daoist
h3_title: Gore-Eye Daoist Mini-Boss Fight and Guide
content: Try to keep him boxed in if possible — getting his back stuck to a wall can severely limit how much blood he can expel from his eyeballs, and stop the projectiles from seeking you out. Use stunning, staggering, and heavy hits to keep him off-balance and unable to cast his spells, and he’ll fall before long.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gore-Eye_Daoist.md', within the main section titled 'Gore-Eye Daoist', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Gore-Eye Daoist' and the sub-subsection 'Gore-Eye Daoist Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Try to keep him boxed in if possible — getting his back stuck to a wall can severely limit how much blood he can expel from his eyeballs, and stop the projectiles from seeking you out. Use stunning, staggering, and heavy hits to keep him off-balance and unable to cast his spells, and he’ll fall before long.
